

public class diamond_hole {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		for(int i=1;i<=5;i++) {
			for(int j=5;j>i;j--) {
				System.out.print(" ");
			}
			for(int k=1;k<=2*i-1;k++) {
				if(k==1||i==5||k==2*i-1)
				System.out.print("*");
				else
					System.out.print(" ");
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}

}
